title: 03/17/21 DPS Hour 1 Tom Waddle
itunes:title: 03/17/21 DPS Hour 1 Tom Waddle
description:
Tom Waddle talks to Dan about the Chicago Bears needs at quarterback. Tom says that the Bears is in his blood and that the Bears is in his DNA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
